content.title: Welcome to the UnrealNET Cluster!
content.text:
Welcome to the cluster.

Thanks for joining our All-Map ARK: Survival Ascended PvE cluster.
We focus on a friendly, fair and lag-free experience for all players.

The main focus of this cluster: I'm a working father of two daughters, i need validation in my gameplay. This is what the cluster is build around. Not too grindy, not too speedy.

Features:
• all current and future maps included
• Quality of Life mods
• Balanced settings
• Active admins & community









Issues / Suggestion?
• Join the Discord: https://discord.unrealdj.nl (Or press the button at the lower left)  
• Open an ticket using the "create ticket" under the server support section

content.title: Rules
content.text:
Core Rules (Short Overview)

• No pillar/foundation claiming — build a real base or don’t build there.
• Respect other bases and give space.
• No griefing, harassment, or luring wild dinos to bases.
• No building in caves, obelisks, boss areas, or important resource spawns.
• 1 main base per tribe per map.
• Outposts and "pretty builds" allowed. 
• PvE only — no stealing, no killing tames.
• No exploiting, duping, or mesh building.
• Inactive bases removed after 30 days.
• World Nodes (like oil) have to be set public. 

Full rules are available on Discord




Active Admins: 
UnrealDJ and AZNPrince

content.title: Cluster Settings
content.text:
General Settings
• XP: 1
• Harvest: 2
• Taming: 3
• Breeding speed, maturation, and imprinting tuned for quality-of-life
• Slightly boosted player and dino stats (balanced, not OP)

Server Features
• All maps connected through cluster transfer
• Fast flyers enabled 
• Player/tribe limits optimized for performance
• Cross-ARK item & dino transfers enabled where supported

Performance Goals
• Clean world
• Low clutter
• Depot unused tames (use dino balls) 
• No spam building or abandoned structures

content.title: Quick Start Guide
content.text:
You get a "Newbie Boost" till level 15. There are specific engrams that will unlock while you level up where you get access to a set of tools and basic building materials.  (Bed + food + Building Resources) - Use this to your advantage! -

Dont be afraid to ask for help!

content.title: Mod List
content.text:
• AA - Automated Ark (ARK Automation)
• Custom Dino Levels (More 150s!)
• Extra Hairstyles
• Awesome Teleporters (Easy teleportation / CrossARK)
• ASR (ARKitecht Structures Remastered) - Better building options!
• Variant Cycle Tool (Easy structure Skin editing)
• Better Breeding (Always additive breeding) 
• Upgrade Station (Make your gear pro)
• S-Dino's Variants / Fantastic Tames (Cool looking dinos!)
• Shiny Dino's (Even cooler dinos!)
• Solo Farm Mod (Singleplayer friendly!)
• Automated Dino Wipes (every 12 hours)
• Dino Depot (Clear up your dinos, no Cryo sickness!)
• Flyer Seatbelts (Cause ejecting from 500 meter........)
• Oceanic Platforms (Cause cmon wildcard...)
• Mouse Saver (Hold your mouse to keep harvesting!)
• LOOT Grabber (Press C to loot the ground/bodies)
• Reusable Bola / Torch / Etc
• Nanohs Spyglass (See wild dino stats) - USE THE GREEN ONE
• Nanohs Ascended Saddles (Saddles with stats!)
• Nanohs Ascended Equipment (Cool stuff)
• Dino Finder (Use minimap at level 60 to find dinos)
• Discord Cluster Chat
• Dino Book (For when you dont have access to dododex)
• Spawn Buffs & Boosts & Kits
• CS Structures (For when AA doesnt cut it)
• Hypers Extra's (QOL game extras)

content.title: Honorable Mentions
content.text: • AZNPrince - AZ has helped keep this server clean and tidy, He has been with us since the beginning and has been an amazing help upgrading the servers to handle playercount

content.title: Parental Advisory Discord Server
content.text:
The parental Advisory Discord Server has been absolutely amazing in allowing us to host their main ARK Cluster. 
A lot of our players come from this discord server.

You can join them at: https://discord.gg/parentaladvisory

content.title: Notable Streamers
content.text: • Fox - Getting people excited to play on this server and being super helpfull - Follow her at tiktok.com/@fake_fox87

content.title: Optional Support / Donations
content.text:
Running a full ARK cluster takes time, resources, and server costs. 

If you enjoy the community and would like to help keep the cluster online, you’re welcome to support it with a voluntary donation.


Donations are 100% optional and never required.
You won’t get any in-game advantages, discord titles, perks, or special treatment — everything stays fair and equal for all players.

If you’d like to help out, you can click the "donate" button below. 



Your support is appreciated, but simply playing on the cluster and being part of the community already means a lot. ♥️
